2.1.name: wordpress/breukies-pages-widget
2.1.description: Breukie’s Pages Widget is a wordPress widget, to replace the standard pages widget by Automattic. This widget displays links using the wp_list_pages function, utilizes several available parameters like sort and exclude pages in your menu. You can also set up to 9 intances of this widget in your sidebar(s). This widget will also work together with the Page Link Manager plugin by Garrett Murphey without modifying any code.
